title: Unable to build due tokio-tower dependency
body:
```
$ cargo build --release --bin noria-server
```
```
   Compiling librocksdb-sys v6.17.3
   Compiling tokio-tower v0.4.0 (https://github.com/tower-rs/tokio-tower.git?branch=no-box#5ad387a9)
   Compiling hyper v0.13.10
error[E0658]: `impl Trait` in type aliases is unstable
  --> /home/me/.cargo/git/checkouts/tokio-tower-98a883543a8cb142/5ad387a/src/multiplex/client.rs:98:19
   |
98 |     type Future = impl Future<Output = Result<Self::Response, Self::Error>> + Send;
   |                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
   = note: see issue #63063 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/63063> for more information
   = help: add `#![feature(min_type_alias_impl_trait)]` to the crate attributes to enable

error[E0658]: `impl Trait` in type aliases is unstable
   --> /home/me/.cargo/git/checkouts/tokio-tower-98a883543a8cb142/5ad387a/src/multiplex/client.rs:399:19
    |
399 |     type Future = impl Future<Output = Result<Self::Response, Self::Error>> + Send;
    |                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
    |
    = note: see issue #63063 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/63063> for more information
    = help: add `#![feature(min_type_alias_impl_trait)]` to the crate attributes to enable

error[E0658]: `impl Trait` in type aliases is unstable
  --> /home/me/.cargo/git/checkouts/tokio-tower-98a883543a8cb142/5ad387a/src/pipeline/client.rs:77:19
   |
77 |     type Future = impl Future<Output = Result<Self::Response, Self::Error>> + Send;
   |                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
   = note: see issue #63063 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/63063> for more information
   = help: add `#![feature(min_type_alias_impl_trait)]` to the crate attributes to enable

error[E0658]: `impl Trait` in type aliases is unstable
   --> /home/me/.cargo/git/checkouts/tokio-tower-98a883543a8cb142/5ad387a/src/pipeline/client.rs:359:19
    |
359 |     type Future = impl Future<Output = Result<Self::Response, Self::Error>> + Send;
    |                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
    |
    = note: see issue #63063 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/63063> for more information
    = help: add `#![feature(min_type_alias_impl_trait)]` to the crate attributes to enable

error: aborting due to 4 previous errors

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0658`.
error: could not compile `tokio-tower`

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
^C  Building [=======================> ] 317/327: librocksdb-sys(build), hyper
```
Is this something to be solved within Cargo.toml?
